face.

Irey is ready to forgive Riom for his rudeness.

with the search for his assistant, Weiler.
Reaper helped Irey with presentations
research and locations, and soon
he disappeared for a while.
Find a clue in the archive.

Check Weiler's private room in

time, you need to occupy yourself with something.

Arriving at the place, Riom and Kenchiru found their
squad... Someone killed all the reapers.
It's worth exploring the battlefield to find clues
or survivors.
quests_В ходе поисков Риом нашел уцелевш:
During the search, Riom found the surviving reaper - Rita.
From her he learns that the detachment of Rivalsers
Rickard's order remained to set the point

After some time, a group of reapers with Rita

quests_Суд признал Риту невиновной и вын:
The court found Rita innocent and passed a sentence
Kreis.
Now the mistress of Purgatory, Death, will decide
whether Rickard will regain his previous title or not.
In the meantime, Riom must report to the Punisher headquarters and
talk to Rickard when he returns.
quests_Крайс получил наказание и на его:
Kreis received his punishment and in his place
Rickard came.
He told Rioma about the increased activity
the longtime enemy of Purgatory - the Risen.
Ravagers, creations of Vlur-Stig,
are also getting stronger every month and
angrier.
Purgatory is actively preparing for war.
For Rioma Ruri, Commander Rikard prepared
something special. Need to meet with
Kaspar in the corridor of the Punisher headquarters,
he will escort Rioma to the armory.
quests_Каспар привел Риома в оружейную,:
Caspar brought Riom to the armory where
artifacts. A mysterious and very powerful weapon.
Anyone who touches it will be exposed
test.
quests_Риом чудом остался жив... Его дос:
Riom miraculously survived...
He was taken by punitive forces to the medical building.
While Riom was passed out, the reapers discovered
a large detachment of rebels on the border between
Silver Desert and Jagged Canyon.
The battle reapers are about to leave for battle.
Punishers will also take part.
Rickard gathers a large detachment for a briefing and
Riom must come to it as soon as possible.

The road of fun led everyone
detachment in the corps of combat reapers.

wears them only in moonlight among
stars, before plunging into the endless
sea."
quests_После сокрушительного поражения,:
After a crushing defeat, Rioma
managed to survive.
But now the reaper is stuck in an unknown to him
section of the canyon. Ravagers are everywhere and
the only chance of salvation is teleport, or
a road leading to a safer place.
quests_Как оказалось, единственный спосо:
As it turned out, the only way to leave
canyon abyss - teleport. He's at work
condition, but without energy. This problem can be
Solve this by changing the battery. Rioma will have hers
get it somewhere and get to the teleport in
alive.

quests_Раздобыть батарейку и активироват: Get a battery and activate the teleport.

Teeny. His detachment equipped outposts and points

But a group of engineers was attacked by Ravagers
and killed everyone except Tini.

fear of such a fierce enemy, I decided
hide and hope for a miracle.
Tiny told about the teleport not far from him
camps and what the device can be
de-energized. It is possible to restore power with
using a battery.
To help Rioma, the engineer shared with him
battery drawing.

research squad of reaper engineers in

quests_Риом успешно добрался до своей це:

but the connection with Ilnara was interrupted...
Neither she nor anyone from her squad
They answer Rioma. Something is clearly wrong here.
quests_Когда Риом вернулся, чтобы узнать:
When Riom returned to find out
what happened to Ilnara’s detachment - a find

The entire outpost was blown away by a hurricane.
There is blood and bodies of devastators everywhere, but

The fate of Ilnara's squad is unknown...
Get to the top of the cliff.

quests_Северный каньон оказался напрочь:
The North Canyon turned out to be completely filled with wild

To check this you will have to find a way

welcome.
quests_Теперь дорога к одной из баз в Во:

equipment, so Rita brought the young reaper to

Riom also learned the nature of healing magic

except that she is accidentally in the world of the Living
